page.description: The .WINDOW_POSITION() method positions a browse on the screen.

argument.description: Optional. Default = "center".The horizontal position of the window. Possible values are:

section.description: The "fill" option allows you to fill the entire Alpha Anywhere client area, without having to maximize the window. By avoiding having to maximize the window, other windows can be opened in a smaller window on top of the window that fills the screen.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = browse.load("CustomerBrowse") ptr.window_position("300", "150") ptr.show()
